description: Welcome to your dream home. This brand new 3 storey row home has 5 spacious bedrooms and 4 modern bathrooms. Enjoy waking up to breathtaking mountain views right from your master bedroom. The Interior layout is thoughtfully designed for both comfort and entertaining. 2/5/10 year home warranty. It has a separate entry for the basement which can be converted into a mortgage helper. No maintenance or strata fees.
